titleStmt.title: His Maiesties letter to the High Sherife of the county of Yorke. May the fifth. 1641. [i.e. 1642].
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed at York, by Robert Barker and re-printed in London,

notesStmt.note: In title: 1641 is a typographical error.
Steele notation: Type border. Wee County, Contrary.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
